mapper.insert: insert into settings (id, gmt_created, gmt_modified, setting_name, setting_value) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{settingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) on duplicate key update setting_value = #{settingValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_created, gmt_modified, setting_name, setting_value from settings
